<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 81</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A synthetic adrenaline supplement that increases awareness and reaction time.

 **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 1 minute; **Stage 1** [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) and can use the additional action to Step or Stride (1 round); **Stage 2** [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 round); Stage 3 [drained 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and stupefied 2 (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
